de.japi.components.listeners

Class Japi2ComponentListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.japi.components.listeners.AbstractJapi2Listener
      • de.japi.components.listeners.Japi2ComponentListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Japi2ComponentListener
extends AbstractJapi2Listener
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener
    JAPI2 wrapper for an ComponentListener.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Japi2ComponentListener

        public Japi2ComponentListener(Japi2Session session,
                              int type)
        Creates a new ComponentListener for a specific event type.

        Please note that the object id is set to -1 by this constructor. It must be manually set to a valid id (greater -1) through AbstractJapi2Listener.setId(int). Otherwise nothing will happen and an error is logged if debugging is enabled.

        Parameters:
        session - the session object to operate on.
        type - a type argument for the listener to listen on.

      • Japi2ComponentListener

        public Japi2ComponentListener(Japi2Session session,
                              int id,
                              int type)
        Creates a new ComponentListener for a specific event type.
        Parameters:
        session - the session object to operate on.
        id - the id of the object to listen on.
        type - a type argument for the listener to listen on.
